DeprecationHeader.description:
A header containing the deprecation date of the underlying endpoint. For more information, please refer to the deprecation header RFC:
https://tools.ietf.org/id/draft-dalal-deprecation-header-01.html

InternalGlooNormalizedPathHeader.description: An internal header used by Snyk's API-Gateway for analytics.

InternalGlooOrgIdHeader.description: An internal header used by Snyk's API-Gateway for analytics.

RequestIdResponseHeader.description: A header containing a unique id used for tracking this request. If you are reporting an issue to Snyk it's very helpful to provide this ID.

SunsetHeader.description:
A header containing the date of when the underlying endpoint will be removed. This header is only present if the endpoint has been deprecated. Please refer to the RFC for more information:
https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8594

VersionRequestedResponseHeader.description: A header containing the version of the endpoint requested by the caller.

VersionServedResponseHeader.description: A header containing the version of the endpoint that was served by the API.

VersionStageResponseHeader.description: A header containing the version stage of the endpoint. This stage describes the guarantees snyk provides surrounding stability of the endpoint.

EndingBefore.description: Return the page of results immediately before this cursor
EndingBefore.name: ending_before

Limit.description: Number of results to return per page
Limit.name: limit

StartingAfter.description: Return the page of results immediately after this cursor
StartingAfter.name: starting_after

Version.description: The requested version of the endpoint to process the request
Version.name: version

400.description: Bad Request: A parameter provided as a part of the request was invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized: the request requires an authentication token or a token with more permissions.

403.description: Forbidden: The client does not have access rights to the content.

404.description: Not Found: The resource being operated on could not be found.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error was encountered while attempting to process the request.

clientId.description: The oauth2 client id for the app.

isPublic.description: A boolean to indicate an app is publicly available.

name.description: The name given to the app.

redirectUris.description: The provided redirect URIs for the app.

scopes.description: The scopes this app is allowed to request during authorization.

clientSecret.description: The oauth2 client secret for the app. This is the only time this secret will be returned, store it securely and don't lose it.

CodeIssue.description: An issue discovered by SAST code analysis

priorityScoreFactors.description: Descriptions of factors affecting priority score

ignored.description: Whether the issue has been ignored

IssueType.description: Issue type. Implies the existence of a resource /issues/detail/{issue-type}/{id}.

email.description: The email address of the invitee.

isActive.description: The active status of the invitation.

org.description: The organization the invite was created for.

role.description: The role assigned to the invitee on acceptance.

created.description: The date that the project was created on

hostname.description: The hostname for a CLI project, null if not set

origin.description: The origin the project was added from

status.description: Describes if a project is currently monitored or it is de-activated

type.description: The package manager of the project

id.description: The Snyk ID corresponding to this user

get.description: Get a list of organizations your installed App has been granted access to by the user.

parameters.description: The oauth2 client id of your app.
parameters.name: client_id

200.description: A list of organizations the app has been granted access to by the user.

200.description: List of available versions is returned

parameters.description: The requested version of the API
parameters.name: version

200.description: OpenAPI specification matching requested version is returned

get.description: Get a list of apps created by an organization.

parameters.description: The ID of the org
parameters.name: org_id

200.description: A list of apps for this organization is being returned

parameters.description: The ID of the org which will be creating and owning the app
parameters.name: org_id

name.description: Name of the app to display to users during authorization.

redirectUris.description: List of allowed redirect URIs to call back after authentication.

scopes.description: The scopes this app is allowed to request during authorization.

200.description: A new app has been created

post.description: Invite a user to an organization.

parameters.description: The id of the org the user is being invited to
parameters.name: org_id

role.description: The role public ID that will be granted to to invitee on acceptance.

201.description: A new organization invitation has been created

parameters.description: Return projects that belong to the provided target
